h1: How Many Calories Are in a Domino's Pizza Slice?
assumptions: Medium hand-tossed crust cheese pizza; one slice (1/8 of 12-inch pizza); standard Domino's recipe, no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pizza size, crust type, toppings, location, and recipe changes. Check Domino's app or site for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Domino's medium cheese pizza has about 220 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Domino's cheese pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 220 kcal for one slice from a medium hand-tossed cheese pizza.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a dominos pizza slice?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g carbs per slice, mostly from the crust.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Domino's pizza slices?
faqs.a: Yes, around 500 mg per slice due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How do toppings affect calories in a dominos pizza slice?
faqs.a: Toppings like pepperoni add 20-50 kcal; veggies add fewer.

faqs.q: Calories in a large vs. medium Domino's pizza slice?
faqs.a: Large slices have more, around 280-300 kcal vs. 220 for medium.
